io.nitric.http

Class HttpResponse.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.nitric.http.HttpResponse.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    HttpResponse

    public static class HttpResponse.Builder
extends Object

    Provides a HTTP response builder class.

    Since:
    1.0
